2.0.1.en: SDK3 rewrite. Full changelog on Github

2.0.2.en: Luminance fix for Motion and Outdoor Sensors

2.0.3.en: Added Garnea Downlight and Bulb 1600 Lumen White

2.0.4.en: Added new version of Being Ceiling Lamp and Resonate Outdoor Wall Light. Fix: On/Off was not correcty set on dim to/from 0

2.0.5.en: Added Fugato Triple Spotlight. Thx Caseda!

2.0.6.en: Added Econic Hanging Wall light. Thx Caseda!

2.0.7.en: Added Lily Outdoor XL Spotlight and Runner Single Spotlight

2.0.8.en: Zigbee Driver and Cluster update forced

2.0.9.en: Added product ID's for some already added device in other colors

2.0.10.en: Added additional product ID for Play Lightbar

2.0.12.en: Added E14 Candle White Ambience BT and Filament G125

2.0.13.en: Added Calla Outdoor Tall Path Light and Appear Outdoor Wall Light (Upper and Lower)

2.0.14.en: Added a few product ID's to already supported devices and added manufacturerName Signify Netherlands B.V. to all drivers

2.0.20.en: Reverted Power On Behavior update, some bulbs does not initiate

2.0.21.en: Test version, only on github. Added support for two modes, Motion detect and Occupancy. The devices firmware version specify what is used). When using Occupancy the device will continue to show motion alarm until no motion is detected. When using OnOff the device will show alarm according to defined alarm time in settings.

2.0.22.en: Added support for Bulb E14 P45 White, Bulb E14 Candle White and Color Ambiance (BT) and Phoenix Downlight.

2.0.23.en: Added support for Buckram Spotlights and added more device Id's to some already added devices.

2.0.26.en: Added support for Milliskin GU10 Recessed Spotlight and Filament ST72 E27.

2.0.27.en: Replaced faulty Smart Button flowcards with correct ones.

2.0.29.en: Added support for Aurelle Panel Round, Centris Panel, Centris Spot and added some device Id's to already supported devices. Optimized images to shrink the size of the app.

2.0.30.en: Added alternative drivers for motion/outdoor sensors. Outdoor Occupancy Sensor / Occupancy Sensor.

2.0.31.en: Added support for Dimmer Switch (Gen 3) and Adore Bathroom Recessed Downlights. Added flowcard for alerts (lights).

2.0.32.en: Minor improvements and added some additional device ID's

2.0.35.en: Power On Control Behaviour for lights reactivated.

2.0.36.en: Added support for Turaco Outdoor Wall Light and Argenta Spotlights. Added more device ID's to already supported devices

2.0.37.en: Added Power On Control Behaviour to the plug

2.0.38.en: Fix for Power On Control Behaviour for the plug.

2.0.39.en: Added support for: Argenta 3-light Spotlight, Amarant Linear Outdoor Light, Fuzo Outddor Pedestal Light. Also added support for new versions of several already supported devices, including the new indoor and outdoor motion/occupancy sensors.

2.0.40.en: Added support for new versions of: Calla Outdoor Short Path Light, Bulb White Ambiance A19 E27, Ensis pendant and Go.

2.0.41.en: Added support for: Filament Bulb White Ambient A60 E27, Bulb White Ambient E27, Filament Bulb White Ambient G23 E27, Filament Bulb White Ambient G125 E27, Bulb White 1100 Lumen, Filament Bulb Candle E14 and Mickey Mouse Bloom/Aura Living Colors. Also added support for new versions of: Smart Plug, Buckram Spotlights and Indoor Occupancy Sensor.

2.0.43.en: Added new model of Being Ceiling.

2.0.44.en: Added Led indicator and sensitivity settings to Occupancy Sensors. Added support for Sumiri Panel and Infuse Medium Ceiling Light

2.0.45.en: Added support for Tap Dial Switch

2.0.47.nl: uitbreiding met RDM alleen enkel tuimel mogelijk
